text: Glutamicibacter ardleyensis is a psychrotrophic and rod-coccus bacterium from the genus of Glutamicibacter. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Glutamicibacter ardleyensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2005 Category:Micrococcineae
title: Glutamicibacter ardleyensis
